column1: Smoque BBQ////The place can't be beat for BBQ in Chicago. Most of the bad reviews seem to come from people who thought it was some nicer sit-down restaurant or people who base it off of their personal idiosyncratic tastes. The brisket is amazing
column2: with the pulled pork not too far behind. The real gem is the Peach Cobbler
column3: I'd eat it every day if I lived nearby.
